loginModal.title: Login Required
loginModal.description: Please login to continue chatting with the bot.

chat.reminderDetected: I detected a reminder in your message. Would you like to set it up?
chat.noMessages: No messages yet. Start a conversation!

connectCalendar.title: Connect Google Calendar
connectCalendar.description: To use reminder features, please connect your Google Calendar

home.title: Your AI Assistant
home.description: Chat with an AI that can help you with anything, set appointments, and manage reminders intelligently

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: We value your privacy. This document explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information. We are committed to maintaining the security and privacy of all user data.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.content:
We collect necessary information for our services, including:
- User account information (name, email, profile picture)
- Chat history and AI interactions
- Appointment and reminder data
- Usage data (login times, features used)
- Device information (device type, OS, browser)

dataUsage.title: Data Usage
dataUsage.content:
We use your data to:
- Provide and improve AI services
- Enhance user experience
- Provide support and troubleshooting
- Personalize responses
- Analyze and develop new features
- Prevent illegal activities

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
dataProtection.content:
We implement strict security measures:
- Data encryption during transmission and storage
- Strict access controls
- Regular security audits and updates
- Regular data backups
- Employee security training

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing
dataSharing.content:
We do not sell or rent your personal information. We may share data in the following cases:
- With your consent
- When required by law
- To protect our rights or security
- With verified third-party service providers

userRights.title: User Rights
userRights.content:
You have the right to:
- Access and edit your personal data
- Request data deletion
- Request a copy of your data
- Object to data processing
- Cancel your subscription
- File complaints about data usage

cookies.title: Cookie Usage
cookies.content:
We use cookies to:
- Remember your preferences
- Improve performance
- Analyze usage
- Provide personalized service
You can manage cookie settings in your browser

children.title: Children's Data
children.content: We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If you discover we have collected data from a child without parental consent, please contact us to remove the information.

changes.title: Policy Changes
changes.content: We may update this privacy policy periodically. We will notify you of significant changes via email or website announcements.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content:
If you have questions about our privacy policy, please contact us:
Email: admin@promptlabai.com
Address: Bangkok, Thailand
Business Hours: Mon-Fri 09:00-18:00

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By using our service, you agree to these terms and conditions. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, please do not use our service.

useOfService.title: Use of Service
useOfService.content:
You agree to:
- Use the service in accordance with applicable laws
- Not use the service for illegal purposes
- Not interfere with service operations
- Not attempt unauthorized access
- Not transmit harmful content or viruses

userResponsibilities.title: User Responsibilities
userResponsibilities.content:
You are responsible for:
- Maintaining account and password security
- Reporting unauthorized access
- Providing accurate information
- All actions under your account
- Complying with relevant laws

content.title: Content and Communication
content.content:
You acknowledge that:
- AI-generated content may not be 100% accurate
- You should verify information
- We are not responsible for decisions made using our service
- You should use judgment when following advice

limitations.title: Limitations of Liability
limitations.content:
We are not liable for:
- Damages from service use
- Data loss
- Service interruptions
- Indirect or consequential damages
- Third-party actions

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: All intellectual property rights in the service belong to us. You are granted a limited license to use the service and may not copy, modify, or distribute any content without permission.

termination.title: Service Termination
termination.content:
We reserve the right to:
- Suspend or terminate service for violations
- Modify or update the service
- Restrict access to certain features
- Cancel inactive accounts

disputes.title: Dispute Resolution
disputes.content: Any disputes arising from service use will be resolved through negotiation first. If no agreement is reached, Thai law will govern the resolution.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We may update these terms at any time. We will notify you of significant changes, and continued use after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

offline.title: You are offline
offline.description: Please check your internet connection and try again

pwaPrompt.title: Install พร้อมจด App
pwaPrompt.description: Install our app for a better experience with quick access and offline capabilities.
